page.title: 05HEALTH CARE
page.content: {Grimoldby, Lincolnshire {Health Care A resident doctor has his home and surgery in Grimoldby. He practices conventional medicine but offers homeopathy and naturist treatments also. He has a modern, purpose built surgery building with consulting room, dispensary, toilets, offices and meeting room. He supervises the running of a health club for families, on all aspects of health. Health Visitors, District Nurses and Physiotherapists all use the surgery facilities. A travelling Chiropodist visits the Old Peoples Home. Villagers also receive house calls from doctors in Louth and visit Louth County Hospital for treatment. The nearest maternity hospital is Grimsby 20miles to the North. Day Centre in Louth for the mentally handicapped.
